shoppinglist.languagePrompt: Fuhst, pick yah language 'nd yah stahtin' page, to continue with Murmli.
shoppinglist.welcome:
Welcome to Murmli, yah smaht app fuh recipes, shoppin', 'nd nutrition.

 This app uses AI to make translations, interpretations, 'nd recipe selections a breeze. You can even create yah own recipes 'nd add 'em directly to the shoppin' list to make yah life moah efficient.
shoppinglist.quickGuide:
Just type what yah need in the input field, 'nd Murmli adds it to the shoppin' list with AI.

 Ev'rything's sorted by supermarket categories so yah can find 'em easy.

 Once items ah added, yah can click on 'em to find alternatives.
shoppinglist.options: Find moah options like sharin' or sortin' yah list in the menu (top right). Share the list with yah pahtnah to work togethah. Yah can revoke sharin' any time.

planner.welcome: Set how many folks 'nd recipes yah wanna plan for below. In the text field, yah can also add yah wishes in natural language, an AI will automatically consider 'em when choosin' recipes (e.g., vegetarian for athletes).
planner.options:
Yah'll see recipes now. 
Give a thumbs up if yah like a recipe, or a thumbs down if not. 

The system learns from yah choices to make bettah suggestions.
planner.shoppinglist:
Once yah've picked the desired number of recipes, you'll automagically go to the shoppin' list. It includes all ingredients for the recipes. 

 Under 'Recipes', yah'll find yah chosen recipes with instructions. There, yah can rate 'em 'nd give feedback.

recipes.overview: Here's an overview of recipes belongin' to yah shoppin' list, yah own recipes, 'nd favorites. From there, yah can access 'em.
recipes.create: On the plus symbol top right, yah can create yah own recipes. Type yah idea, the AI generates it, 'nd yah can upload a pic of ingredients.
recipes.addToList: If yah wanna add one of yah recipes or favorite recipes to yah shoppin' list, open the recipe 'nd add it through the menu (three dots) top right.

tracker.overview:
Just jot down what yah ate. 

Yah can describe it in natural language, like “a plate of pasta”, name specific products, or give exact calorie counts – up to yah.
tracker.calorieGoal:
Set yah daily calorie goal yahself or let us calculate it automagically. 

Just enter yah body data once – we'll handle the rest.
tracker.activityTracking: Track yah sporty activities too, like “20 minutes joggin'”. We'll automagically calculate how many extra calories yah can consume – just fuh yah.

setup.aboutApp: This app was privately developed to simplify life with a shoppin' list 'nd intelligent recipe plannin'.

general.errorMessage: An erroh occurred. Please try again soon or report this erroh.

general.name: Name
general.voiceDialogInfo: The voice recordin' is goin' on right now. Ya can chuck it anytime. If ya send it, it'll be processed automatically.

shoppingList.noSharedUsers: The list hasn't been shared yet.

sortCategoriesDialog.title: Sort Categories
sortCategoriesDialog.text: Click on a category to set a position, or use the arrows.

removeRecipes.dialogMsg: Are yah sure yah wanna remove all recipes from yah shoppin' list? Ingredients stay on the list 'nd need to be deleted separately.

removeIngredients.dialogMsg: Are yah sure yah wanna remove all ingredient-related entries from yah shoppin' list? Recipes stay in the recipe view.

clearAll.dialogMsg: Are yah sure yah wanna remove all items from yah shoppin' list?

deleteList.dialogMsg: Are yah sure yah wanna delete yah entire shoppin' list?

shoppingList.voiceRecordingInfo: Voice recordin' is currently runnin'. Yah can say in natural language what should be on yah shoppin' list. Yah request is processed 'nd sent. If yah wanna discard the recordin', yah can delete it. As long as yah don't send the recordin', it stays local on yah device.

planner.title: Recipe Plannah
planner.fetchingMessage: Yah recipes ah loadin' in the background. Please wait.

resetSelectionDialog.dialogMsg: Are yah sure yah wanna reset yah recipe selection?

recipes.title: Recipes
recipes.empty: Yah haven't created a recipe yet.
recipes.noFavorites: Yah don't have any favorites yet.

createRecipeDialog.title: Generate Recipe
createRecipeDialog.text:
Describe yah recipe as detailed as possible: What must be included, what do yah wanna avoid? The more info yah give, the bettah we can generate yah individual recipe.

After the creation process, it takes about 2–3 minutes fuh yah recipe to appear undah 'My Recipes'.

Optionally, yah can add a photo – eithah from yah gallery or by takin' a new pic. It could be a pic of yah fridge, individual ingredients, or somethin' that reminds yah of yah desired recipe.
createRecipeDialog.generatingText: Yah recipe is bein' created. This can take up to two minutes. Then yah'll find it undah 'My Recipes'.
createRecipeDialog.label: Recipe descripshun

recipes.addIngreditensInfo: Ah yah sure yah wanna add the recipe to yah current shoppin' list? All ingredients will be added automagically.
recipes.processingMessage: Yah recipe is bein' created in the background. Yah'll be notified when it's ready.

tips.swipeToRemove: Swipe ovah a recipe left o' right ta remove it.
tips.createOwn: Tap the plus icon up top on the right ta create ya own recipes.
tips.printPdf: Wanna print ya recipes? Open the three-dot menu down at the bottom right an' you can make a PDF.
tips.editOwn: You can edit ya own recipes any time. Open the recipe an' use the three-dot menu — you'll find all the options theah.
tips.feedbackPlanner: Not likin' a recipe from the planner? Open it an' gimme feedback through the three-dot menu — we'll take cah of it.

recipe.title: Recipe

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.label: Yah Feedback
feedback.success:
Thanks fuh yah feedback!
We'll take care of it.

recipe.promoteStarted: The recipe's now bein' added t' the daytabase in the backgound.
recipe.promoteInfo: This user recipe's alre'ady paht of the official daytabase.

chat.title: Recipe Chat
chat.welcomeMessage: Hey! I'm yah recipe assistant. You can ask me questions 'bout this recipe — like ingredients, prep, or alternatives. I got the recipe data heah.

settings.title: Settings
settings.confirmDeleteText: Ah yah sure yah wanna delete yah account permanently? This action can't be undone.
settings.accountDeleted: Yah account has been successfully deleted.
settings.importWarningText: Importin' will overwrite all current user data 'nd yah'll be logged out. Wanna continue?

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Reach us through the followin' channels
contact.footer: We look forward to yah message!

tracker.createActivityInfo: Add yah activities here, the app calculates the calories fuh yah automagically.

palOptions.homeOffice: Home Office – sittin', no physical activity
palOptions.salesperson: Salesperson – standin', walkin', light physical work
palOptions.waiter: Waitah – lots of walkin', carryin' plates
palOptions.constructionWorker: Construction Workah – physically demandin', liftin', carryin'
palOptions.farmer: Farmah – physical work, liftin', operatin' machines
palOptions.constructionSite: Construction Site – heavy physical work, liftin', standin'
palOptions.mountainGuide: Mountain Guide – extreme activity, long walkin' in terrain

tracker.bodyDataInfo: Here yah can enter yah body data to calculate yah calorie goals. These ah used to determine yah daily calorie goals.
tracker.errorNoBodydata: If yah wanna use the calorie calculatah, yah need to enter yah body data first.
tracker.errorBodydataActivity: If yah wanna use activity trackin', yah need to enter yah body data first.
tracker.voiceRecordingInfo:
The recordin' is saved locally. If yah wanna send the audio file, click Send. 
Alternatively, yah can click Discard to not send the recordin'.
tracker.askDialog: Here yah can ask questions about nutrition. The app will try to answer yah question 'nd includes yah body data 'nd yah calorie countah entries from the last 14 days. Please note that the answers ah based on the information yah entered in the app.
tracker.descriptionPlaceholder: Descibe yah meal or activity 'bout the pictuah
tracker.activityRequired: Please entah an activity befaw ya move on.

chat.title: Trackah Assistint
chat.welcomeMessage: Hey! I'm yah Trackah Assistint. I can answah questions 'bout yah cahlories, nutrition facts, and eatin' habits.

trainingPlans.title: Trainin' Plans

step1.title: Create Trainin' Plan
step1.content: Trainin' plans can be created individually, yah can describe exactly what yah want, what yah train for, where, how often a week, 'nd how intense/long.

step2.title: Edit Trainin' Plan
step2.content: If somethin' ain't right, yah can edit the trainin' plans with natural language. Just write what should be changed, 'nd yah'll get an updated version.

step3.title: Train
step3.content: Trainin' plans go by time if activated. Active trainin' plans can be trained 'nd logged, each set individually – weights or reps or duration of sets. At the end, yah have the option to send the trainin' directly to the calorie countah to track the calories burned.

trainingPlans.createPlanInstructions:
Describe yah plan as precisely as possible: What do yah wanna train? How often a week? In what environment? What type of trainin' do yah prefer?

Yah can also specify the intensity: light, moderate, or intense.

Examples:
'I wanna go to the gym four times a week, focus on upper body. I'm well-trained.'

'I have back pain on the left back of the shouldah. Create a plan with targeted exercises for one day a week to improve my posture 'nd relieve the pain.'

The more info yah give, the more suitable yah trainin' plan will be created.
trainingPlans.subtitle: Here yah can create 'nd manage yah trainin' plans.
trainingPlans.confirmDeletePlan: Ah yah sure yah wanna delete this trainin' plan?
trainingPlans.noPlans: Yah haven't created any trainin' plans yet.
trainingPlans.noPlansInfo: No trainin' plans available yet. Yah can add a new trainin' plan with the plus button top right.

activateDialog.title: Activate Trainin' Plan
activateDialog.msg:
When yah staht yah trainin' plan, the staht date is set. Then yah'll see which week of yah trainin' plan yah're in.
Ah yah sure yah wanna staht the trainin' plan?

deleteDialog.title: Delete Trainin' Plan
deleteDialog.msg: Ah yah sure yah wanna delete this trainin' plan?

finishDialog.title: Finish Trainin'
finishDialog.msg: When yah finish the trainin', the staht date 'nd yah entire progress will be reset. Ah yah sure yah wanna finish the trainin'?

trainingPlans.processingMessage: Yah trainin' plan is bein' created in the background. Yah'll be notified when it's ready.
trainingPlans.readyMessage: Yah trainin' plan has been created.
trainingPlans.askDialog: You can ask questions about this tainin' plan. The last tainin' logs (up to 10) will be sent along.
trainingPlans.continuePlanDescription: Create a new plan based on this trainin' plan. Ya can optionally add requests.
trainingPlans.voiceRecordingInfo: Speak ya descripshun fo' the trainin' plan inta the mic. The recordin' stays stored locally an' won't be turned inta text 'til ya send it. If ya don't wanna use the recordin', ya can chuck it.

training.title: Trainin' Log
training.noPlan: No trainin' planned fuh today or the plan contains no exercises.
training.cancelTrainingConfirm: Do ya eally wanna cahncel the tainin'?
